short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Solve the problem that http sites are converted to https by default.
short.zh_CN: 解决http站点被默认转换为https问题。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By specifying the default http protocol of the domain name, solve the trouble caused by chrome's automatic conversion of https protocol
